content: this detailed and illustrated crochet pattern will take through every step to make this stunning triangle shawl/scarf this harlequin shawl has a an amazingly effective and easy to follow pattern of bobbles and fillet crochet use your creativity to add blocks of contrasting colour for endless combinations this pattern is for the following sizes toddler child and adult pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology this listing is for an instant pdf download for the crochet harlequin shawl pattern is made using 8 ply wool in 2 colours and requires a 4 5mm hook you will need 200grams for the toddler size 300grams for the child size and 400grams for the adult size skill level - beginner/easy to work this pattern you need to know how to - double_crochet and single_crochet stitches pattern includes instructions for the bobble stitch this listing is not a finished product you will not receive a finished scarf if you buy this listing there will be no refund for purchases made in error all of our patterns include many pictures gauge abbreviation keys stitch counts and extra notes to help explain if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact us -----------instant download link will be emailed to you once payment has cleared--------------- the pattern and photographs contained in this document are property of peach&paige this pattern is available for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed you may sell the finished product credit to peach&paige must be given for the pattern please follow peach&paige on instagram and facebook facebook com/peachandpaige instagram com/peachandpaige
